goal: Configure Nexus repository manager Helm values

steps.name: Review Nexus Helm template
steps.prompt: Examine the Nexus Helm values template to understand configuration options.

steps.name: Configure persistence
steps.prompt: Setup persistent volume configuration for Nexus data storage with appropriate size and storage class.

steps.name: Setup resource limits
steps.prompt: Configure CPU and memory resources for Nexus based on expected artifact storage needs.

steps.name: Configure ingress
steps.prompt: Setup ingress configuration for Nexus with appropriate hostname and TLS settings.
